name: Wacky Breakout (KhevanT)
description:
This game "Wacky Breakout" was made as a part of an online course on Unity & C# I partook in. It is not meant to be a polished game, simply a part of my journey learning how to code!  :D

The current version of the game was finished in January 2021.

The code repository for this game can be found here:
 https://github.com/KhevanT/wacky-breakout

None of the art or sound assets used belong to me. They were in used under a fair use license.
